quest.name: A Hasty Recovery
journal: Terremiaux has the look of a man who hates unfinished business.

With his subordinates safe, Terremiaux can at last return to his original task─the retrieval of stolen weapons and armor. And to avoid the pitfalls of his initial undertaking, he has devised a plan. First, he will create a diversion to draw the attention of as many Vanu as he can. This will offer you the chance to reclaim the equipment with diminished resistance.
You have successfully retrieved all the stolen equipment. Return beyond the bridge to Vundu Ok' Bendu and speak with Terremiaux.
You return to Terremiaux, and he is at a loss as to how to repay you. He asks that you return the equipment to Laniaitte back at camp and relay to her all that has transpired.

Laniaitte is relieved to hear the search party is safe and the equipment is all accounted for. Although the Vanu's sudden interest in finer weaponry concerns her, she is glad to have had the aid of such a capable adventurer, and foresees need of your skills again in the future.

dialogue.name: TERREMIAUX
dialogue.text: Your assistance has been more than anyone could ask for, but there is yet work to be done. We did not come here to simply be driven back out─nay, we must take back the stolen weapons and armor!

dialogue.name: TERREMIAUX
dialogue.text: I will create a diversion to draw what attention I can from the Vanu nearby. While they're distracted, I need you to retrieve them.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Terremiaux still means to complete the mission? ...May Halone grant him strength.

dialogue.name: ENTRANCESOLDIER01755
dialogue.text: Please...you must reclaim the equipment from the Vanu!

dialogue.name: TERREMIAUX
dialogue.text: Everything appears to be accounted for. Words fail to express my gratitude, Forename. Our equipment, and perhaps even my subordinates, would be lost to the Vanu if not for your aid.

dialogue.name: TERREMIAUX
dialogue.text: Pray return to the Rosehouse and deliver them to Lady Laniaitte. It is only fitting that she should receive them from you. We will return in due time, when my men have recovered their strength.

dialogue.name: TERREMIAUX
dialogue.text: There is naught we can do to repay your selfless actions, Forename. After you report to Lady Laniaitte, I trust you will take a well-earned rest.

dialogue.name: ENTRANCESOLDIER01755
dialogue.text: We owe much and more to your aid. Please see the weapons and armor safely to Lady Laniaitte.

dialogue.name: FORTSOLDIERA01757
dialogue.text: ...Thank you, adventurer.

dialogue.name: FORTSOLDIERB01757
dialogue.text: I feel I owe you my life, adventurer. Lady Laniaitte will be overjoyed to see the equipment returned to Camp Cloudtop.

dialogue.name: FORTSOLDIERC01757
dialogue.text: We will not tarry long, but please go on ahead. Lady Laniaitte is sure to be waiting.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, you've returned. What of the equipment, and the search party?

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: You never fail to impress, my friend. I see, the others are not yet fit to travel. No matter. I take solace in knowing they're no longer in harm's way.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: And yet, the Vanu's recent fixation on Ishgardian weaponry still concerns me. With but a weak grasp of metallurgy, I can only surmise they crave more advanced weaponry to oppose us.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: It may finally be time to strengthen security here at Cloudtop. Our duty is to keep watch for Dravanian activity, after all─we can ill afford to be distracted by the Vanu.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: In any event, I was right to call upon you for help. Thank you again, for everything.

dialogue.name: GUENRIOL
dialogue.text: Your assistance has been more than anyone could ask for, but there is yet work to be done. We did not come here to simply be driven back out─naye, we must retrieve the supplies stolen from Camp Cloudtop.

dialogue.name: GUENRIOL
dialogue.text: I will create a diversion to draw what attention I can from the Vanu nearby. While they're distracted, I need you to retrieve the stolen supplies.

dialogue.name: GUENRIOL
dialogue.text: I will draw their attention for as long as I can. You must retrieve the supplies before they return.

dialogue.name: ENTRANCESOLDIER01755
dialogue.text: Has the lieutenant not yet returned?

dialogue.name: ENTRANCESOLDIER01755
dialogue.text: You have returned with the supplies! Thank goodness. The lieutenant will be glad to hear of it.

dialogue.name: FORTSOLDIERA01757
dialogue.text: Pray speak with the lieutenant. He will be relieved to know you've retrieved the supplies.

dialogue.name: FORTSOLDIERB01757
dialogue.text: You need not worry about us, though I'm sure the lieutenant is anxious to hear of your work.

dialogue.name: FORTSOLDIERC01757
dialogue.text: Thank goodness you're all right. Lieutenant Guenriol has been awaiting word of your success.

dialogue.name: GUENRIOL
dialogue.text: All the supplies appear to be accounted for. Words fail to express my gratitude, Forename. Our supplies, and perhaps even my subordinates, would be lost to the Vanu if not for your aid.

dialogue.name: GUENRIOL
dialogue.text: Pray return to the Rosehouse and deliver the supplies to Lady Laniaitte, along with a report of what transpired. It is only fitting that she should hear it from you. We shall return in due time, when my men have recovered their strength.

dialogue.name: GUENRIOL
dialogue.text: There is naught we can do to repay your selfless actions, Forename. After you report to Lady Laniaitte, I trust you will take a well-earned rest.
